document_data.name: The Tithing
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tithing''' was a religious ceremony observed by the clergy of [[Tiamat]], the Dragon Queen within the [[Untheric pantheon]].
document_data.Description: [[Priest]]s of Tiamat made small daily offerings, usually in the form of a [[gemstone]] or coins, to Tiamat. The priests concealed their offering by cupping their hands while uttering a prayer. When the prayer finished there was a chance that the offering would actually vanish from the priest's hands, showing a sign of Tiamat's blessing.
